title: ProjectionArtifact
description: A derived visual artefact created by applying a Transform (e.g., plan overlay warped to map, XYZ tile set, photomontage composite).

artifact_path.description: Blob/path reference to the stored artefact (image/tiles/geotiff).

evidence_ref.description: Optional EvidenceRef for this artefact (if registered into evidence_refs).
